languages.text: "Ха-ха-ха... нет! Весь твой конвой сдох. Я взял форму этого сосунка Камиля — я служил полгода в губернаторских шавках, знаю их повадки, могу притвориться одним из них. Надо же было убедиться, что ты, тварь, не решишь развернуться и улететь домой, а пойдешь прямо в засаду", {n}— молодой человек хрипит и сплевывает кровавую пену.{/n} "Не радуйся, что справил{mf|ся|ась} с нами — моих братьев много, и они придут за тобой. А если не они... а впрочем, сам{mf||а} узнаешь!"

"Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"
languages.original_text: "Ха-ха-ха... нет! Весь твой конвой сдох. Я взял форму этого сосунка Камиля — я служил полгода в губернаторских шавках, знаю их повадки, могу притвориться одним из них. Надо же было убедиться, что ты, тварь, не решишь развернуться и улететь домой, а пойдешь прямо в засаду", {n}— молодой человек хрипит и сплевывает кровавую пену.{/n} "Не радуйся, что справил{mf|ся|ась} с нами — моих братьев много, и они придут за тобой. А если не они... а впрочем, сам{mf||а} узнаешь!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I can pose as one of them. I had to make sure you don't decide to turn around and fly home like the scum you are, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My brethren are many and they'll come for you. And if they don't— oh never mind, you'll see for yourself!"

My brethren are many and they'll come for you. And if they don't— oh never mind, you'll see for yourself!"

"Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure your scummy face didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Though, never mind, you'll see for yourself!"

I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

"Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

languages.text: "Ha ha ha ... nein! Euer gesamte Konvoi ist fort. Ich habe mir die Uniform dieses winselnden Welpen Camille genommen. Ich habe die Schergen des Gouverneurs sechs Monate lang studiert. Es war keine Schwierigkeit, mich als einer von ihnen auszugeben. Ich musste sichergehen, dass Ihr Abschaum nicht beschließt, umzukehren und nach Hause zu fliegen, statt geradewegs in den Hinterhalt zu spazieren." {n}Der junge Mann röchelt und spuckt blutigen Schaum.{/n} "Lasst es Euch nicht zu Kopf steigen, dass Ihr uns ausgeschaltet habt. Meine Kameraden sind zahlreich, und sie machen Jagd auf Euch. Und wenn nicht ... Aber seht selbst."
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha ha ... nein! Euer gesamte Konvoi ist fort. Ich habe mir die Uniform dieses winselnden Welpen Camille genommen. Ich habe die Schergen des Gouverneurs sechs Monate lang studiert. Es war keine Schwierigkeit, mich als einer von ihnen auszugeben. Ich musste sichergehen, dass Ihr widerwärtiger Wurm nicht beschließt, umzukehren und nach Hause zu fliegen, statt geradewegs in den Hinterhalt zu spazieren." {n}Der junge Mann röchelt und spuckt blutigen Schaum.{/n} "Lasst es Euch nicht zu Kopf steigen, dass Ihr uns ausgeschaltet habt. Meine Kameraden sind zahlreich, und sie machen Jagd auf Euch. Und wenn nicht ... Wobei, nein, das werdet Ihr dann schon sehen!"

languages.text: « Ha ha ha... non ! Tout votre convoi a été décimé. J'ai pris l'uniforme de ce geignard de Camille. En six mois avec les subordonnés du gouverneur, j'ai appris leurs méthodes. Je n'ai eu aucun mal à me faire passer pour l'un d'entre eux. Je devais m'assurer qu'il ne vous prendrait pas l'idée de faire demi-tour et de rentrer chez vous, au lieu de foncer droit dans l'embuscade. » {n}Le jeune homme se racle la gorge et crache une écume sanglante.{/n} « N'allez pas imaginer que vous nous avez eus. Mes camarades sont nombreux, ils vont venir s'occuper de vous. Et s'ils ne le font pas... Qu'importe, vous verrez bien par vous-même ! »
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ha ha... non ! Tout votre convoi a été décimé. J'ai pris l'uniforme de ce geignard de Camille. En six mois avec les subordonnés du gouverneur, j'ai appris leurs méthodes. Je n'ai eu aucun mal à me faire passer pour l'un d'entre eux. Je devais m'assurer qu'il ne vous prendrait pas l'idée de faire demi-tour et de rentrer chez vous, au lieu de foncer droit dans l'embuscade. » {n}Le jeune homme se racle la gorge et crache une écume sanglante.{/n} « N'allez pas imaginer que vous nous avez eus. Mes camarades sont nombreux, ils vont venir s'occuper de vous. Et s'ils ne le font pas... Qu'importe, vous verrez bien par vous-même ! »

languages.text: “哈哈哈……错了！我们把你的整支护卫队都消灭了，我拿走了科米尔的制服。我以前在总督手下服役过六个月，对他们的行事作风了如指掌，轻轻松松地就能假扮成他们的一员。我必须保证你这个人渣会直接走进埋伏圈，而不是掉头飞回家。”{n}年轻人抽搐着，吐了一口血沫。{/n}“别以为你打败了我们，就能忘乎所以。我还有很多同伴，他们会来找你。就算他们都失败了……也不要紧，你会亲眼看到真相！”
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: “哈哈哈……错了！我们把你的整支护卫队都消灭了，我拿走了科米尔的制服。我以前在总督手下服役过六个月，对他们的行事作风了如指掌，轻轻松松地就能假扮成他们的一员。我必须保证你这个人渣会直接走进埋伏圈，而不是掉头飞回家。”{n}年轻人抽搐着，吐了一口血沫。{/n}“别以为你打败了我们，就能忘乎所以。我还有很多同伴，他们会来找你。就算他们都失败了……也不要紧，你会亲眼看到真相！”

languages.text: 「ははは…違うな！お前たちの隊列は、すべて消えた。泣き言を言っていたカミーユの制服を奪った。総督の部下たちと6か月過ごすうちに、彼らのやり方を学んだ。彼らの一員として身を隠すのは難しくなかったよ。お前たちが待ち伏せに合わず、帰ってしまわないようにする必要があったんだよ、くそ野郎」{n}若者はゼーゼーと息を切らし、血まみれの泡を吹いた。{/n}「お前たちが我らを倒したと驕るなよ。俺には多くの仲間がいて、お前らを討つために来る。そして、もし彼らが来ないとして…とにかく、自分の目で確かめることになるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: 「ははは…違うな！お前たちの隊列は、すべて消えた。泣き言を言っていたカミーユの制服を奪った。知事の部下たちと6か月過ごすうちに、彼らのやり方を学んだ。彼らの一員として身を隠すのは難しくなかったよ。お前たちが待ち伏せに合わず、帰ってしまわないようにする必要があったんだよ、くそ野郎」{n}若者はゼーゼーと息を切らし、血まみれの泡を吹いた。{/n}「お前たちが我らを倒したと驕るなよ。俺には多くの仲間がいて、お前らを討つために来る。そして、もし彼らが来ないとして…ああ、気にするな。自分の目で確かめることになるだろう！」

languages.text: «¡Ja, ja, ja... no! Todo su convoy ha desaparecido. Cogí el uniforme de ese cachorro llorón de Camille. Seis meses con los subordinados del gobernador me enseñaron sus métodos. No tuve ningún problema en hacerme pasar por uno de ellos. Tenía que asegurarme de que no decidiera dar media vuelta y volar a casa, en lugar de ir directamente hacia la emboscada». {n}El joven escupe sangre y saliva.{/n} «Que no se os suba a la cabeza que nos habéis derrotado. Hay muchos camaradas míos y vienen a por vosotros. Y si no... Da igual, ¡lo verá con sus propios ojos!».
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja, ja, ja... no! Todo su convoy ha desaparecido. Cogí el uniforme de ese cachorro llorón de Camille. Seis meses con los subordinados del gobernador me enseñaron sus métodos. No tuve ningún problema en hacerme pasar por uno de ellos. Tenía que asegurarme de que su cabeza de escoria no decidiera dar media vuelta y volar a casa, en lugar de ir directamente hacia la emboscada». {n}El joven escupe sangre y saliva.{/n} «Que no se os suba a la cabeza que nos habéis derrotado. Hay muchos camaradas míos y vienen a por vosotros. Y si no... Aunque, no importa, ¡lo verá con sus propios ojos!».

languages.text: "Ha ha ha! Hayır! Tüm konvoyunuz sizlere ömür. O mızmız enik Camille'in üniformasını aldım. Valinin astlarıyla geçirdiğim altı ay bana âdetlerini iyi öğretti. Onlardan biri gibi davranmakta hiç zorlanmadım. Siz şerefsizleri geminize geri dönme fikrinden caydırıp pusuya çekmem gerekiyordu." {n}Genç adam hırıldayıp kanlı bir köpük tükürüyor.{/n} "Bizi alt ettin diye kendini bir halt sanma. Yoldaşlarım çoktur ve hepsi de senin peşinde. Değillerse bile... Neyse, kendin görürsün!"
languages.original_text: "Ha ha ha... no! Your entire convoy's gone. I took that whining pup Camille's uniform. Six months with the governor's underlings taught me their ways. I had no trouble posing as one of them. I had to make sure you scum didn't decide to turn around and fly home, instead of walking straight into the ambush." {n}The young man rasps and spits bloody foam.{/n} "Don't let it go to your head that you took us down. My comrades are many and they are coming for you. And if they are not... Anyway, you'll see for yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha ha ha! Hayır! Tüm konvoyunuz sizlere ömür. O mızmız enik Camille'in üniformasını aldım. Valinin astlarıyla geçirdiğim altı ay bana âdetlerini iyi öğretti. Onlardan biri gibi davranmakta hiç zorlanmadım. Siz şerefsizleri geminize geri dönme fikrinden caydırıp pusuya çekmem gerekiyordu." {n}Genç adam hırıldayıp kanlı bir köpük tükürüyor.{/n} "Bizi alt ettin diye kendini bir halt sanma. Yoldaşlarım çoktur ve hepsi de senin peşinde. Değillerse bile... Neyse, kendin görürsün!"
